text: The 2015–16 Liga ASOBAL, also named Liga ASOBAL BAUHAUS by sponsorship reasons, is the 26th season since its establishment. FC Barcelona was the defending champions. == Promotion and relegation == Teams promoted from 2014–15 División de Plata * SD Teucro * BM Sinfín Teams relegated to 2015–16 División de Plata * MMT Seguros Zamora * Juanfersa Gijón == Teams == {| class="wikitable sortable" !Team !City !Venue !Capacity |- |Abanca Ademar León |León |Palacio de los Deportes |5,188 |- |Ángel Ximénez P.
